body.name: Pack of 2 Video Doorbell Buttons Compatible with Ring Doorbell Pro, Repair Split Cracked Broken Button (Red)
body.stockDetail: Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 13 hrs 12 mins
features: Compatibility - Our replacement buttons work with Ring Video Doorbell Pro model ONLY.
Value Pack of 2 - Rather than spending on a new unit, now you get the chance to fix the issue cheaply.
Make your doorbell water tight again - Replace the cracked button to stop water seeping through.
Injection Molding Design - Our material is translucent so the IR & motion sensor behind the button will still work.
Manual guide included - A guide with illustrations is included for taking out the broken button and installing the new button.
body.description: Quick replacing guide 1. Pinch and wiggle the button out with fingers until you see the base of the button and note there is circuit cable behind it you don't want to pull out too far! 2. Using a small flat end screwdriver slide it down the seam then up under the old button and carefully pry it off from the button holder. 3. Push the button holder back into its original position. 4. Line up your new button (gap in button is at 6 o'clock position) then push down over the button holder until it stops.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The replacment buttons worked!
reviews.reviewText: Great product. Worked as advertised. Use youtube video to replace the button on my existing doorbell pro. Recommend that you follow the precise steps recommended....and take your time. I did, and completed the task in about an hour. Saved on not purchasing a new doorbell pro.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits original Ring Doorbell
reviews.reviewText: I have the original Ring Doorbell. The button was cracked. My son-in-law was able to switch out the button.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Relaxed cracked button, easy to install

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Looking at reviews seen someone else bought for ring viewcam doorbell so have bought these not tried put away has my viewcam is still new not a year old a bit pricey for 2 spare buttons but they are 3D printed and has someone else said they fitted than buying others and not fitting

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The push button on my Ring Doorbell Pro is a flexible rubber button. This button is rigid plastic and does not work in my system. The description should have made clear what type of button it was - rigid or flexible.I returned the product and received a refund.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Purchased these despite being advertised for the ring Pro only. I have a ring view camera and the button was cracked. Decided to try them and wow they fit. So easy to change, no need to take the device apart, just prise the button out and unclipped the button from the mechanism. So easy to do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: These don't work on normal Ring doorbells
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as I saw another review said it could be used as a replacement button, but you can't! It's essentially a plastic cap that sits over the top but there's nothing to push the actual button below to trigger the doorbell.
